players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob's death is tragic. We need to share observations and vote carefully to find the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We should vote for her to protect the town."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night—he's innocent. Diana must be the mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation. Don't believe her lies; we must vote her out to protect the town."
Charlie: "I believe Diana. Alice's claim doesn't add up—why investigate me when Bob was killed? Voting Alice."
You: "Diana is the real mafia trying to frame me. I'm the detective and confirmed Charlie is innocent. Trust me and vote Diana."
